column4: hi - anyone here tried connecting your Ubuntu box to a projector?
no but if it's VGA it should be fine I would think

- hmm...yeah, i can get it to show the boot process and shell- when it comes to X, i've yet to figure out how to write the xorg.conf to setup two screens...and I'll be dang'd if i can figure out the vertical refresh rate and the horiz sync-
yeah, xorg and dual screens can be hard
